DataSourcePortable.Name: TESTE
DataSourcePortable.Content: <DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT TOP 5 TITULO,NMEMPRESTIMOS FROM LIVROS WHERE NMEMPRESTIMOS > 0 ORDER BY NMEMPRESTIMOS DESC" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="TITULO" From="A" Path="TITULO" /> <Field Alias="NMEMPRESTIMOS" From="A" Path="NMEMPRESTIMOS" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
